title: where is my acc
body:
hello, i hope some of u can help me 

so this is not my real acc, i normaly play at EUNE but i then made a tranfor to EU west - and now i cant log in. 
when i try to log ind at EUNE its say i moved server so i shuld log ind to the right one, 

so when i try to log in on west its say not right log ind 

what shuld i do, its a few hours ago, and i did make a ticket {{champion:1}}

replies.body:
Making a ticket was the right move, since we're only able to assist you with recovering your account via Riot Support. You'll be contacted by a specialists soon so we can work together to verify you and assist with the recovery.

Let me know if you have any questions.
